name: YahScore
description:
NOTE: This is a scorekeeping app, not a game.

Universal App - Full iPad/iPhone Retina support

Tired of paper & pencil scorekeeping for 5-dice games like YachtC? Let your i-device do the heavy lifting. From the developers of Yachats, the popular 5-dice game comes YahScore.

YahScore takes the elegant interface of Yachats and adapts it to help you keep score of your real dice games with up to 5 players.

+ Simple, intuitive, single-screen interface
+ Automated scoring - just a couple touches for most categories
+ Interruptable - no loss of data if you need to make a call
+ Customizable 5-of-kind category name
+ Help menu explains how to use the app
+ V3: Spreadsheet style game histories
+ V3: Tournament Mode

Best of all it's free!

If you like using YahScore please leave a review. We'd also love to hear your thoughts and suggestions for future releases

topcatgames@gmail.com
